mapper.sql:
FROM infrCodegroup a WHERE 1 = 1
AND ifcgDelNy = 1 AND ifcgDelNy = 0
AND ifcgName LIKE concat('%',#{shIfcgName},'%')
AND ifcgName LIKE concat('%',#{shValue},'%') AND ifcgNameEng LIKE concat('%',#{shValue},'%')
mapper.select:
SELECT a.ifcgSeq , a.ifcgName , a.ifcgNameEng , a.ifcgDelNy
limit #{startRnumForMysql} , #{rowNumToShow}
select a.ifcgSeq , a.ifcgName , a.ifcgDelNy from infrCodegroup a where 1 = 1 and ifcgDelNy = 0 and ifcgSeq = #{ifcgSeq}
